entry.title: appdev-projects/refactoring-fortune-teller
entry.summary:
Refactoring Fortune Teller with Dynamic Routes

This Chapter contains detailed notes for this project.

Setup

  1. Start the web server by running bin/server.
  2. Navigate to your live application preview.
  3. As you work, remember to navigate to /git and commit often as you work.
  4. rails grade to ensure everything still works.
